name: Flan Pastry - Pate a Foncer
recipeIngredient: 125 g butter (cut into small pieces and slightly softened,
recipeInstructions: 1. Heap the flour on a work surface and make a well. Put the butter eggs, sugar and salt in the middle. With your fingertips, mix and cream the ingredients in the well.
2. Now, little by little, draw the flour into the centre and work the dough with your fingertips to a grainy texture. Add the cold water and mix it until the dough begins to hold together.
3. Using the palm of your hand, push the dough away from you 4 or 5 times until it is smooth. Roll the pastry into a ball, wrap in clingfilm and refrigerate until ready to use.
